Version: 2010.365
Revision: 8
Date: 2013-12-13


New Features:
-------------
- N/A

Bug Fixes:
----------
- Change ntp init script to take into account apu-install new model.

Dependencies:
-------------
- N/A 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 2010.365
Revision: 7
Date: 2013-07-11


New Features:
-------------
- N/A

Bug Fixes:
----------
- Change ntp init script so that the NTP server and NTP port to use are loaded
  from $ROOTACT/etc/ntp.conf file. This aims at making it easier to configure 
  the service if the ONG runs behind a firewall.

Dependencies:
-------------
- N/A 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
